name: Scorching Sands
description: You throw scorching sand at a target to burn them. Make a ranged attack against a creature within 40 feet. On a hit, you deal 1d8 + MOVE ground damage, and the target must make a CON save against your Move DC, becoming Burned on a failure.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
